title: Behind Your Back
description: To get to him, I need to use her.I'll play her like a violin and have her falling in love with me before she even knows what's happening.It will be easy. I've done it before and I'll do it again.She's just a girl.A tool to get what I want.When I'm done with her I won't think twice about walking away.At least, that was what I thought.Until I met her.*This is the first book in a two book series. The sequel, Back To Back, will be out on June 9th. This is a new adult romantic suspense and not suitable for those under the age of 17*
author: Chelsea M. Cameron
